name: Hanukkah Menorah Onesie with Swarovski Crystals
description:
Adorned with Swarovski crystals, this onesie sparkles brightly to commemorate The Festival of Lights. Let your little one shine and wish a Happy Hanukkah to all.

This onesie is a size Newborn to 3 Months, and it is 100% cotton. If you'd like a different size, simply convo me. Remember this year the 1st night of Hanukkah is on December 21st.

For no charge, I am happy to personalize the onesie.

This listing is for the onesie only. Washing instructions included.

Choking Hazard: These crystals, if removed can be a choking hazard. I securely fasten each and every crystal, but small children should be supervised by an adult.

NONSMOKING STUDIO. FREE CUSTOMIZATION. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING.

A SPECIAL NOTE: 10% of the proceeds from my Swarovski Onesie line will go directly to Dr. Denise Faustman of Harvard University at Massachusetts General Hospital. Dr. Faustman is feverishly working on a cure for Type 1 Diabetes, and her work is only funded through private donations. She is my hero (although I've never met her) and I pray she is close to the cure.

name: Got Presents? - Christmas T-Shirt
description:
Can't you just see your little one toddling down the stairs wearing this t-shirt on Christmas morning? Your cutie will ask a bold question with this darling Christmas T-Shirt.

This tee is a size 4T or Youth Extra Small. The design is available in all size toddler t-shirts as well as any size Onesie. If you'd like, I can personalize it for FREE.

The fabric is a soft 100% cotton and has been pre-washed in Dreft (a very gentle laundry soap just for babies). The fabric paint is non-toxic and has been heat treated.

Nonsmoking Home.

International Shipping Available.
